TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，可检索当前组件所能访问的数据源的列表。

span.span: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供用于检索当前的设计时组件所能访问的数据源的列表的方法。 provides methods that can be used to retrieve a list of data sources accessible to the current design-time component. 使用此类型转换器[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]提供显示在列表中的数据源中的值**属性**窗口。This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data sources in the **Properties** window. > [!CAUTION] > 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#4)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#4)]

span.para: 重写该方法以提供您自己的转换需求。可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。这可能是，因此应始终对其进行检查。同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回。

Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements. The can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. This may be , so you should always check. Also, properties on the context object may also return .

param.name: context
param.span: 一个 ，它指示要获取其值的组件或控件。

span.span: An indicating the component or control to get values for.

summary.span: 获取控件可以访问的标准数据源。

span.span: Gets the standard data sources accessible to the control.

returns.span: ，它列出标准的可访问数据源。

span.span: A listing the standard accessible data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由组件所能访问的数据源检索的组件的列表，从设计器中，测试与每个组件方法，并返回有效的数据源的组件。The data sources that are accessible to the component are determined by retrieving a list of components from the designer, testing each component with the method, and then returning the components that are valid data sources.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示从 返回的标准值集合是否为所有可能值的列表。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned from is a list of all possible values.

returns.span: 如果从 返回的 是所有可能值的独占列表，则为 ；如果还可能有其他值，则为 。

span.span: if the returned from is an exclusive list of all possible values; if other values are possible.

returns.span: 当在此类中实现时，此方法始终返回 。

span.span: As implemented in this class, this method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该列表是独占的（如在枚举数据类型中），则其他任何值都无效。If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid. 如果该列表不是独占的则没有其他有效的值的标准列表值之外提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.

span.para: 如果你想要转换的类型支持标准值，重写此方法。 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。它可能是，因此应始终对其进行检查。同样，上下文对象的属性也可能返回。

Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values. The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. It might be , so you should always check. Also, properties of the context object may also return .

param.name: component
param.span: 要检查是否为有效数据源的组件。

span.span: The component to check as a valid data source.

summary.span: 指示指定组件是否为此转换器的有效数据源。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified component is a valid data source for this converter.

returns.span: 如果 实现了 或 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if implements or ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用方法来确定可用作标准的可访问数据源的组件。The method uses the method to determine the components that are available as standard accessible data sources. 有关类，有效的数据源是一个组件，实现或接口。For the class, a valid data source is a component that implements the or interface.

span.para: 自定义数据源转换器可以派生自类，并重写方法，以测试所需使用作为数据源的组件的接口实现。
Custom data source converters can derive from the class, and override the method, to test for the interface implementations that are required to use a component as a data source.
